revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DSL-2500U |revision=/BRU/D D2 |availability=common |type=dsl modem |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v= |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM6332 |cpu1_cspeed=240 |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S25FL016A |ram1=8 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num=1 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |serial= |jtag= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags=ADSL2+ |tp_firmware= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui_eth=00:1B:DA }}'''D-Link DSL-2500U/BRU/D rev. D2''' - ADSL/ADSL2/ADSL2+ modem (router/bridge). <gallery caption="Images of D-Link DSL-2500U/BRU/D h/w ver. D2"> File:DSL-2500U BRU D Front.jpg|Front view </gallery>
The processor is part BCM6332KFBG.
== See also == * [ftp://ftp.dlink.ru/pub/ADSL/DSL-2500U_BRU_D/ DSL-2500U/BRU/D] directory on D-link FTP archive. * [http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/d-link/dsl-2500u D-Link DSL 2500U] in OpenWRT Wiki * [http://pudeev.livejournal.com/35872.html D-Link DSL-25xxU/BRU/x] in the blog of Michael V. Pudeev (russian) * [http://chairday.narod.ru/DSL-2500U.html Reconnect PPPoE on modem DSL-2500U] (russian) [[Has images::external| ]]
